pageProps.content:
Experience

Zimbali Resort is situated inside the elite Zimbali Coastal Estate on the beautiful Dolphin Coast in Kwazulu-Natal.
The resort boasts sensational views of the Indian Ocean & offers its guests a 5-star service with the greatest attention to detail.
Home to 2 swimming pools, a wellness spa, a fully equipped gym & a variety of restaurants, guests will be kept entertained for hours on end. There is also a golf course & floodlit tennis courts for those wishing to stay active.
Zimbali Resort is a wonderful option for families since parents & children will have their pick at an array of land & water-based activities. Babysitters are also available on request.
Zimbali is located within 5km from the bustling town of Ballito, 26km from Umhlanga, 35km from Durban & only 16km from King Shaka International Airport.

Stay

This beachfront hotel features 154 rooms & suites & villas, all offering stunning views of the Indian Ocean, oversized verandas & elegant décor of stone, wood & earth tones inspired by the area’s breathtaking natural surroundings.
Resort facilities include 2 outdoor swimming pools, a spa, a gym, a golf course, floodlit tennis courts, a bar & a variety of indoor & outdoor dining options.

Activities

Zimbali Resort offers plenty of on-site activities, so guests enjoy relaxing treatments at the spa, go golfing, play a round of tennis, explore the area on a bicycle or work up a sweat at the gym.
Guests can also experience a variety of dining options from the café-style lattes & freshly baked pastries to pool-size pizzas, afternoon high tea & evening fine dining.
Day trips to nearby attractions can also be arranged.

subfolders.title: Canelands Beach Club & Spa
subfolders.description: The laidback Canelands Beach Club & Spa boasts a spectacular location overlooking the beach at Salt Rock on the subtropical Kwazulu-Natal coast.   The charming town of Ballito is nearby & King Saka International Airport is only a 15-minute drive away, making this an ideal base from which to explore the surrounding area or as an overnight stay en route to the Battlefields or Phinda Game Reserve.

subfolders.title: Teremok Marine Lodge
subfolders.description: Teremok Marine Lodge is situated in beautiful Umhlanga, one of the most popular beach destinations on Durban’s north coast. Located near a handful of excellent swimming beaches & within driving distance of popular attractions like uShaka Marine World & Gateway shopping complex, Teremok is an ideal base from which to explore the surrounding area.

subfolders.title: The Oyster Box
subfolders.description: The stylish Oyster Box is perched on the edge of the Indian Ocean & offers discerning travellers an elegant retreat close to many of Durban’s top attractions. The hotel is a fusion of old-world charm & modern-day convenience, boasting 2 swimming pools (one with an ocean view & the other one in the gardens that is for over 12’s only), a spa with jacuzzi & hammam as well as a fully-equipped fitness centre.
